page.title: 06FARMING IN BUCHANAN
page.content:
{Moor park}is also owned by the Duke of Montrose. It is grass and barran land. It is also farmed by Walter McAllister and it has 931 sheep.
{Milton Farm (mill) The farm was built in{1620.}The mill stopped working in 1976. The mill was a meal mill and the horses delivered the meal from the mill to the farms. Miss Ronald has lived on the farm for 67 years. She has 10 hens,7 cows,10 sheep and 7 lambs. They make hay on the farm. The fields are grassland. She has 1 dog which is a scottie.
